text:
@realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX #TrumpDeathCult
We have it totally under control. It’s one person coming in from China, and we have it under control. It’s going to be just fine.” - @realDonaldTrump - Jan 22, 2020.

April 28, 2020:

1,012,561+ cases
56,876+ deaths

#FailureInChief
#TrumpDeathToll
#coronavirus https://t.co/VIoRYIc2xN
